content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: end_rod
inventory=[{"type": "blaze_rod", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "lime_terracotta", "quantity": 22, "index": 21}, {"type": "dead_tube_coral", "quantity": 64, "index": 29}, {"type": "ancient_debris", "quantity": 49, "index": 30}, {"type": "chorus_fruit", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "granite_stairs", "quantity": 57, "index": 39}]
thought: To craft an end_rod, I need to first craft a popped_chorus_fruit. To do this, I need to smelt the chorus_fruit at slot 36 into an empty slot (eg., 11).
act: smelt from slot 36 to slot 11 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: end_rod
inventory=[{"type": "popped_chorus_fruit", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "blaze_rod", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "lime_terracotta", "quantity": 22, "index": 21}, {"type": "dead_tube_coral", "quantity": 64, "index": 29}, {"type": "ancient_debris", "quantity": 49, "index": 30}, {"type": "granite_stairs", "quantity": 57, "index": 39}]
thought: To craft an end_rod, I need to place a blaze_rod and a popped_chorus_fruit in the crafting table. I will first move the blaze_rod from slot 20 to slot 1.
act: move from slot 20 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: end_rod
inventory=[{"type": "blaze_powder", "quantity": 2, "index": 0}, {"type": "blaze_rod", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "popped_chorus_fruit", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "lime_terracotta", "quantity": 22, "index": 21}, {"type": "dead_tube_coral", "quantity": 64, "index": 29}, {"type": "ancient_debris", "quantity": 49, "index": 30}, {"type": "granite_stairs", "quantity": 57, "index": 39}]
thought: To craft an end_rod, I need to place a blaze_rod and a popped_chorus_fruit in the crafting table. I will now move the popped_chorus_fruit from slot 11 to slot 4.
act: move from slot 11 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: end_rod
inventory=[{"type": "end_rod", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "blaze_rod", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "popped_chorus_fruit", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "lime_terracotta", "quantity": 22, "index": 21}, {"type": "dead_tube_coral", "quantity": 64, "index": 29}, {"type": "ancient_debris", "quantity": 49, "index": 30}, {"type": "granite_stairs", "quantity": 57, "index": 39}]
thought: To craft an end_rod, I need to place a blaze_rod and a popped_chorus_fruit in the crafting table. I will now move the end_rod from slot 0 to slot 11.
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4
